title: The Iyengar Yoga Centre of Hong Kong
address: Shop 406, New Victory House, 93-103 Wing Lok Street, Sheung Wan
desc: Iyengar Yoga Centres are found in most large cities of the world. Those who suffer from chronic back ache may find that Iyengar Yoga provides a good method to reduce the frequency, severity and duration of back pain. In addition, they will probably discover that general health and fitness levels improve with the practice of Iyengar yoga. Most practitioners report an enhanced sense of well-being and peace of mind.
